---
title: "Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita"
---

This page explores how life expectancy relates to GDP per capita over time (GDP on a log scale to reduce skew).

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gm = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

plt.figure(figsize=(8,5))
plt.scatter(gm["gdp_per_capita"], gm["life_expectancy"], alpha=0.5)
plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita (log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita (1952â€“2007)")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
